title: Medieval 2 Total War Online Battle #194 (2v3 Siege) -  Counter Flanking
description:
A 2v3 Siege battle in the desert.  The Italian factions are divided and the scots decided to join the Venetians.  The beginning of the battle has a lot mind games and small skirmishes.  But the battle ends with a big Bang!  Will the defenders hold? Or will they be Completely destroyed?  

Channels Involved:
Defenders:
Nazebaze - Milan: https://www.youtube.com/user/nazebaze

Captain_Invisible- Sicily: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCsB6k6OrSNGAEpOK8qMF_Cg

Attackers:

PaladinBob - Venice: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCKB8mXpeYFFdd2cKDlXpUXQ

SwedishLandsknekt - Moors:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCscalm6yMOZkUVhjPXYG0SQ 

Lord Tsunami - Scotland: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCYuVYoANEKi0jBoYdrIh4wg 


Follow me on twitter: https://twitter.com/pixelatedapollo
How to send me battle replays: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7nG3uZoDkCU
How to play Medieval 2 Online: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YGfItCMitPg
